title: My launcher is broken
body: As the title says, i open up league press the launch button, it makes the noise then proceeds to sit there and do nothing. help!

replies.body: Do you have any anti-viruses or firewalls enabled? Try running League with those disabled.

I spent 100 years with the same problem.  The launcher got slower and slower and eventually did what you are saying.  I would get the same EULA every 5-10 minutes, but no game.  I followed tips and guides, reinstalled, repaired etc with no joy.

I decided to delete bitdefender and voila.  Works like a charm.  GLHF.

Have you tried a repair on the client? It will take some time, but will auto scan and fix files if they corrupt etc. Open lol, dont click launch, instead go to the help icon (?) click, then click repair. it will say it takes some time to fix, but no where near a new install.
